summary: A two handed  sword forged by the Daedra.
descriptionHtml: This is a powerful blade that was forged by the deadra who came to Nirn to help create but left once they realized they were losing there power. The Shadow Sword was left behind in the chaos when everyone realized their power was being drained, it hold great power and the wielder can only be someone with true combat prowess.
author: Donovanfin3
